languages.text: "Распознаю алтарь управления предохранительной системой. Для успеха нашей диверсии он подлежит казни, да простит нас {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}дух{/g} сей благословенной машины".

traits.locale_text: "Распознаю алтарь управления предохранительной системой. Для успеха нашей диверсии он подлежит казни, да простит нас {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}дух{/g} сей благословенной машины".

languages.text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."
languages.original_text: "Распознаю алтарь управления предохранительной системой. Для успеха нашей диверсии он подлежит казни, да простит нас {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}дух{/g} сей благословенной машины".

traits.locale_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. In order for our diversion to be successful, it must be executed — for which may the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} of this blessed machine forgive us."

"I identify this as the safety system control altar. In order for our diversion to be successful, it must be executed — for which may the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} of this blessed machine forgive us."

"I identify this as the safety system control altar. In order for our diversion to be successful, it must be executed — for which may the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} of this blessed machine forgive us."

"I identify this as the safety system control altar. In order for our diversion to be successful, it must be executed — for which may the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} of this blessed machine forgive us."
"I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."
"I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

languages.text: "Ich identifiziere das als den Kontrollaltar des Sicherheitssystems. Damit unsere Ablenkung Erfolg hat, muss diese gesegnete Maschine hingerichtet werden — und möge ihr {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeist{/g} uns verzeihen."
languages.original_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

traits.locale_text: "Ich identifiziere das als den Kontrollaltar des Sicherheitssystems. Damit unsere Ablenkung Erfolg hat, muss er hingerichtet werden — was der {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Geist{/g} dieser gesegneten Maschine uns verzeihen möge."

languages.text: « Identification : autel de commandes du système de sécurité. Pour que notre diversion réussisse, il convient d'exécuter cette machine bénie... Que son {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit{/g} nous pardonne. »
languages.original_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

traits.locale_text: « Identification : autel de commandes du système de sécurité. Pour que notre diversion réussisse, il convient d'exécuter cette machine bénie... Que son {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprit{/g} nous pardonne. »

languages.text: “识别为安全系统控制台。为了成功进行营救行动，这台受到祝福的机器必须做出牺牲，愿它的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}宽恕我们。”
languages.original_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

traits.locale_text: “识别为安全系统控制祭坛。为了营救行动成功，这个祭坛必须做出牺牲。愿受祝福的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}宽恕我们。”

languages.text: 「これは安全システム制御用祭壇と識別する。我々の陽動作戦を成功させるには、このシステムを処刑せねばならない…そうすれば、この祝福された機械の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}精霊{/g}が許してくれるかもしれん」
languages.original_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

traits.locale_text: 「これは安全システム制御用祭壇と識別する。我々の陽動作戦を成功させるには、このシステムを実行せねばならない…そうすれば、この祝福された機械の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}精霊{/g}が許してくれるかもしれん」

languages.text: «Lo identifico como el altar de control del sistema de seguridad. Para que nuestra distracción tenga éxito, debemos ejecutar esta máquina bendita. Ruego que su {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu{/g} perdone nuestras ofensas».
languages.original_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

traits.locale_text: «Lo identifico como el altar de control del sistema de seguridad. Para que nuestra distracción tenga éxito, debemos ejecutarlo. Ruego que el {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritu{/g} de esta bendita máquina nos perdone nuestras acciones».

languages.text: "Makineyi güvenlik sistemi kontrol sunağı olarak tanımladım. Hilemizi başarıyla tatbik edebilmemiz için bu yüce makine infaz edilmeli. {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Ruhu{/g} bizi bağışlasın."
languages.original_text: "I identify this as the safety system control altar. For our diversion to succeed, this blessed machine must be executed — and may its {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}spirit{/g} forgive us."

traits.locale_text: "Bunun güvenlik sistemi kontrol sunağı olduğunu teyit ediyorum. Uğraşlarımızın başarıyla neticelenmesi için bu yüce makine infaz edilmeli. {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Ruh{/g}u bizi bağışlasın."
